name: Anhangá
description:
Legend has it that the Anhangá punished hunters who abused animals and the forest. Invaders could take invisible blows, gore and kick, or fall under the spell of magical illusions, get lost in the woods, or worse.

But it was possible to offer brandy or tobacco rolls to Anhangá, asking for their protection. Burning cashew nuts and making crosses with wood from the forest itself also drove him away.

However, this only worked if the hunter behaved correctly. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
